doc:
Dorothea Kent https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorothea_Kent 0 Dorothea Kent (June 21, 1916 – August 23, 1990) was an American film actress. She appeared in 42 films between 1935 and 1948. A former model, she often played dumb sidekicks of the heroine, and rarely played the lead. In addition to her credited roles, she also had roles in six other films, including her last role in the 1948 film The Babe Ruth Story. She was born in St. Joseph, Missouri in 1916, and died in 1990 from breast cancer. She was buried at the San Fernando Mission Cemetery. Dorothea_Kent ( June_21_,_1916 – August_23 , 1990 ) was an_American_film_actress . She appeared in 42_films between 1935_and_1948 . A_former_model , she often played dumb_sidekicks of the_heroine , and rarely_played the_lead . In addition to her_credited_roles , she also had roles in six_other_films , including her_last_role in the_1948_film The_Babe_Ruth_Story . She was_born in St._Joseph , Missouri in 1916 , and died in 1990 from breast_cancer . She was_buried at the_San_Fernando_Mission_Cemetery .
